name: Index of
description: Find the index of a specific item in an Array or String. See [Array.prototype.indexOf on MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array/indexOf) and [String.prototype.indexOf on MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String/indexOf) for more information.

output.description: If the item exists in the Array, the index of that item is returned. If the item is not found, -1 is returned.
